original: Noblewoman: How [i]dare[/i] you insinuate that I engaged in an adulterous relationship!
translation: Noblewoman: 你[i]胆敢[/i]影射我与人通奸！

original: CDress: T-[p/][s/]That's not what I-!
translation: CDress: 这、[p/][s/]我不是这——！

original: Noblewoman: Enough![p/] If you try to speak with me again,[p/] I'll have the Kingsguard throw you out!
translation: Noblewoman: 够了！[p/]你再试图与我攀谈，[p/]就等着被国王卫队赶出去吧！

original: CDress: Ugh...[p/] This isn't working.
translation: CDress: 呃……[p/]这样不行。

original: ADress: ...I don't think asking them like that will be very effective.
translation: ADress: ……我觉得这么问他们不会很有效。

original: CDress: What?
translation: CDress: 什么？

original: ADress: Did you expect anyone here to be truthful with you?
translation: ADress: 你难道指望这里有人对你坦诚相待吗？

original: ADress: You're essentially asking them if they cheated on their spouses.
translation: ADress: 归根结底你是在问他们是否对配偶不忠。

original: CDress: ...Have you been spying on me?!
translation: CDress: ……你一直在监视我吗？！

original: ADress: Not intentionally...[p/] I was just surprised to see you [i]here[/i] of all places.
translation: ADress: 我不是有意的……[p/]只是很惊讶会在[i]这里[/i]看到你。

original: CDress: Right...[p/] I guess that makes sense.
translation: CDress: 好吧……[p/]我想这是合理的。

original: ADress: ...You're not "party crashing", are you?
translation: ADress: ……你该不会是不请自来的吧？

original: CDress: Of course not![p/][s/] I came here with Ruby and Tyrion!
translation: CDress: 当然不是！[p/][s/]我是和鲁比还有提利昂一起来的！

original: ADress: ...That honestly raises more questions than answers.[p/] But I'll take your word for it.
translation: ADress: ……老实说这更让人困惑了。[p/]不过我相信你的话。

original: ADress: Anyways,[p/] you're looking for your birth parents, aren't you?
translation: ADress: 无论如何，[p/]你在寻找你的亲生父母，对吧？

original: CDress: Was I being [i]that[/i] obvious?
translation: CDress: 有[i]那么[/i]明显吗？

original: ADress: It's the only reason I could think of.[p/] Why else would you be trying to speak with members of the nobility?
translation: ADress: 这是我能想到的唯一理由。[p/]不然你为什么会试图和贵族搭话？

original: CDress: ...
translation: CDress: ……

original: ADress: I don't know if it's any of my business.
translation: ADress: 我不知道这和我有任何关系。

original: ADress: But think hard about whether this is what you truly want.
translation: ADress: 但是认真考虑下这是不是你真正想要的。

original: ADress: Getting entangled in the aristocracy will only bring you misery.
translation: ADress: 卷入贵族的纠葛只会给你带来痛苦。

original: ADress: I've read your file.[p/] You have everything you could ever want.
translation: ADress: 我看过你的档案。[p/]你拥有想要的一切。

original: ADress: You have your mother and your friends.[p/] You even have a lover.
translation: ADress: 你有母亲，有朋友。[p/]甚至恋人。

original: CDress: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: CDress: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: ADress: You're in a relationship with Mr. Cuthbert, are you not?
translation: ADress: 你和卡斯伯特先生在谈恋爱，不是吗？

original: CDress: N-[p/][s/]No...[p/] Tyrion's not my...
translation: CDress: 不、[p/][s/]不是……[p/]提利昂不是我的……

original: ADress: Really?[p/] From the way you two behave around one another,[p/] I just assumed.
translation: ADress: 真的吗？从你们俩的行为举止来看，[p/]我猜是。

original: ADress: It's pretty obvious you have feelings for him.
translation: ADress: 很明显你对他有好感。

original: CDress: What?![p/][s/] How obvious?!
translation: CDress: 什么？[p/][s/]有多明显？！

original: ADress: Did he seriously not notice?[p/] I'd think someone with his deductive reasoning skills would [i]easily[/i] see through you.
translation: ADress: 他真没注意到吗？[p/]我觉得像他这么有推理能力的人应该[i]很容易[/i]看穿你吧。

original: CDress: O-[p/][s/]Oh yeah?![p/][s/] What about you and Aster?!
translation: CDress: 是、[p/][s/]是吗？[p/][s/]你和阿斯特怎么样了？！

original: ADress: ...I have no idea what you're talking about.
translation: ADress: ……我不知道你在说什么。

original: CDress: Come on![p/][s/] I was [i]there[/i] at Von Sanctus Manor![p/][s/] It's so obvious you like him.
translation: CDress: 拜托！[p/][s/]当时我也在[i]那个[/i]冯·桑克图斯庄园！[p/][s/]很明显你喜欢他。

original: ADress: Please.[p/] You're grossly exaggerating things.
translation: ADress: 得了吧。[p/]你太夸张了。

original: ADress: He may be my fiancé but I only have the utmost respect for him.
translation: ADress: 他可能是我的未婚夫，但我对他只有崇高的敬意。

original: CDress: ...
translation: CDress: ……

original: CDress: ...And what if I told you he was standing right behind you?
translation: CDress: ……那如果我告诉你他正站在你身后呢？

original: ADress: Do you honestly think I'd fall for something like that?
translation: ADress: 你真的觉得我会上你的当吗？

original: Aster: What are you falling for?
translation: Aster: 上什么当？

original: ADress: A-[p/][s/]Ah?!
translation: ADress: 啊、[p/][s/]啊？！

original: ADress: Y-[p/][s/]Y-[p/][s/]Y-[p/][s/]Your highness?!
translation: ADress: 殿、[p/][s/]殿、[p/][s/]殿、[p/][s/]殿下？！

original: Alaric: Oh.[p/] Hello, Lady Steelwind.
translation: Alaric: 噢。[p/]你好，斯蒂尔文德女士。

original: Knight: Your Highness![p/] Please don't run ahead like that.
translation: Knight: 殿下！[p/]请别跑那么快。

original: Your conversation with Harold was definitely...[p/] interesting.[p/] But you still find yourself with very few leads.
translation: 你与哈罗德的交谈确实很……[p/]有益。[p/]但你发现自己还是没有什么线索。

original: Be it dragons or demons,[p/] the origins of the Eye of Horus still remain a mystery.
translation: 无论是龙还是恶魔，[p/]荷鲁斯之眼的起源依然是一个谜。

original: You find yourself returning to the ballroom.[p/] And you spot Celeste in the corner with some other people.
translation: 你发现自己又回到了舞厅。[p/]并且看到塞莱斯特站在角落里，周围有一些其他人。

original: ...Is she with Aster and Steelwind?
translation: ……是阿斯特和斯蒂尔文德？

original: CDress: Hey, Aster.[p/] What do you think of Steelwind's dress?
translation: CDress: 嗨，阿斯特。[p/]你觉得斯蒂尔文德的礼服怎么样？

original: Aster: It suits you very well, Ms. Steelwind.[p/] You look lovely.
translation: Aster: 非常适合你，斯蒂尔文德女士。[p/]你看起来很可爱。

original: ADress: *squeak*. [mind="dsajflksdahgflkjdsahgfkjsadfh"/]
translation: ADress: *尖叫*。[mind="dsajflksdahgflkjdsahgfkjsadfh"/]

original: Alaric: ...Gross.
translation: Alaric: ……怪恶心的。

original: As you approach the group,[p/] you're stopped by a knight from the Kingsguard.
translation: 当你接近他们时，[p/]国王卫队的骑士拦住了你。

original: He stares you down.
translation: 他紧盯着你。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……怎么了？

original: Knight: [i]Reperio Arcanum[/i].
translation: Knight: [i]Reperio Arcanum[/i]。

original: That was the incantation for [b]Detect Magic[/b].
translation: 是[b]法术探测[/b]的咒语。

original: Knight: ...
translation: Knight: ……

original: The knight stares you up and down.
translation: 骑士上下打量着你。

original: Celeste hasn't cast any spells on you lately.[p/] So he shouldn't be able to see any traces of magic.
translation: 塞莱斯特最近没有对你施法。[p/]所以他应该看不出任何魔法痕迹。

original: Aster: Oh![p/] Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aster: 噢！[p/]卡斯伯特先生。

original: Tyrion: What was [i]that[/i] all about?
translation: Tyrion: [i]这[/i]是怎么回事？

original: Aster: My apologies.[p/] They were making sure you weren't disguising yourself with an [b]illusion[/b].
translation: Aster: 抱歉。[p/]他们在确保你没有用幻象术进行伪装。

original: Alaric: The Kingsguard are charged with keeping us safe.[p/] They must take every precaution to protect us.
translation: Alaric: 国王卫队的职责是保护我们的安全。[p/]他们必须谨小慎微。

original: Tyrion: Oh?[p/] And who might you be?
translation: Tyrion: 哦？[p/]你又是哪位？

original: Alaric: Do not speak so familiarly with me, peasant!
translation: Alaric: 别和我套近乎，平民！

original: Aster: Alaric![p/] Don't speak to him like that!
translation: Aster: 阿拉里克！[p/]不可以这么和他说话！

original: Alaric: Why [i]shouldn't[/i] I speak to him as I please?!
translation: Alaric: 我乐意这么和他说话[i]不行[/i]吗？！

original: Alaric: I am prince Alaric de Wyverngarde VI.[p/] I will [i]not[/i] demote myself by showing courtesy to a commoner!
translation: Alaric: 我是王子阿尔里克・维文加德六世。[p/]我[i]不会[/i]自我贬低向平民表示礼貌！

original: ...Doesn't he mean "demean"?
translation: ……他大概想说“自降身份”？

original: Aster: I-[p/]I'm terribly sorry about him, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aster: 我、[p/]我对此表示诚挚的歉意，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]It's fine...
translation: Tyrion: 没、[p/][s/]没关系……

original: Tyrion: ...Anyways,[p/] weren't [i]you[/i] supposed to be investigating your birth parents?
translation: Tyrion: ……总之，[p/][i]你[/i]不是应该在调查自己的亲生父母吗？

original: Tyrion: Leave the poor woman alone.
translation: Tyrion: 别逗她了。

original: CDress: She started it!
translation: CDress: 是她先开始的！

original: Tyrion: Right...
translation: Tyrion: 好吧……

original: Aster: I'm actually quite surprised to see you [i]both[/i] here.
translation: Aster: 事实上我很惊讶能在这儿遇见你们[i]两位[/i]。

original: Aster: What brings you to the Lords' Ball, Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Aster: 你们为什么来参加勋爵的舞会呢，卡斯伯特先生？

original: Tyrion: We were just accompanying Ms. Tymora.[p/] Her client has business with Lord Frega.
translation: Tyrion: 我们是陪泰摩拉女士来的。[p/]她的委托人与弗雷加勋爵有业务往来。

original: Aster: ...Her "client"?
translation: Aster: ……她的“委托人”？

original: Beatrice: ...
translation: Beatrice: ……

original: Aster: B-[p/][s/]Beatrice?!
translation: Aster: 比、[p/][s/]比亚特丽丝？！

original: ADress: ...!
translation: ADress: ……！

original: Beatrice suddenly storms through the ballroom.[p/] She almost walks right past you before she hears Aster's voice.
translation: 比亚特丽丝突然冲进了舞厅。[p/]在听到阿斯特的声音之前，她几乎已经从你身边走过了。

original: She looks furious.[p/] Did her discussion with Lord Frega go badly?
translation: 她看起来非常生气。[p/]是和弗雷加勋爵的谈话出了什么问题吗？

original: Beatrice: O-[p/][s/]Oh...[p/] That voice...
translation: Beatrice: 哦、[p/][s/]哦……[p/]这声音……

original: Beatrice: Is that you, Aster?
translation: Beatrice: 是你吧，阿斯特？

original: Aster: It really [i]is[/i] you!
translation: Aster: 真的[i]是[/i]你！

original: She called him "Aster" instead of "Your Highness".[p/] Do they personally know each other?
translation: 她叫他 “阿斯特” 而不是 “殿下”。[p/]他们私下认识吗？

original: Beatrice: I'm glad to see you again.[p/] It's been quite some time.
translation: Beatrice: 很高兴再次见到你。[p/]好久不见。

original: Aster: ...
translation: Aster: ……

original: Aster: Is that really all you have to say?
translation: Aster: 你想说的就这些？

original: ADress: ...
translation: ADress: ……

original: ADress: It appears you two have much to talk about.[p/] I'll be taking my leave.
translation: ADress: 你们俩看起来有很多话要说。[p/]我先走了。

original: Beatrice: ...
translation: Beatrice: ……

original: Aster: ...
translation: Aster: ……

original: There's a bit of tension in the air...
translation: 气氛有点紧张……

original: CDress: ...
translation: CDress: ……

original: Tyrion: Celeste.[p/] W-[p/][s/]We should probably get going too.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特。[p/]我、[p/][s/]我们也该走了。

original: CDress: Y-[p/][s/]Yeah...
translation: CDress: 好、[p/][s/]好的……

original: CDress: Wow...[p/] [i]That[/i] was awkward.
translation: CDress: 哇……[p/]好尴尬啊。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] I wonder how those two know each other.
translation: Tyrion: 确实……[p/]我很好奇他们是怎么认识的。

original: She's working with Ms. Tymora,[p/] but she somehow knows Lord Frega [i]and[/i] the Crown Prince.
translation: 她和泰摩拉女士共事，[p/]却认识弗雷加勋爵和王储殿下。

original: Just who [i]is[/i] she?
translation: 她究竟[i]是[/i]谁？

original: Well...[p/] You suppose it's none of your business.
translation: 嗯…… [p/]你觉得这与你无关。

original: Tyrion: ...Anyways,[p/] how did [i]your[/i] investigation go?
translation: Tyrion: ……总之，[p/][i]你的[/i]调查怎么样了？

original: CDress: I got nothing.[p/] I think all I did was make a bunch of the nobles mad.
translation: CDress: 一无所获。[p/]我想还触怒了不少贵族。

original: Tyrion: Sorry...[p/] I know you really wanted answers.
translation: Tyrion: 抱歉……[p/]我知道你很想找到答案。

original: Tyrion: But I'm sure something will come up.
translation: Tyrion: 不过我确信很快就会有线索的。

original: CDress: You think so?
translation: CDress: 真的吗？

original: It might be a little irresponsible to give her hope like this.
translation: 像这样给她希望似乎有点不负责任。

original: A noble abandoned her at a tavern in a rundown village.
translation: 她被贵族遗弃在了一个破败村庄的酒馆里。

original: You doubt someone like that would make themselves easy to find.
translation: 你怀疑那样的贵族不是能轻易找到的。

original: CDress: Anyways...[p/] I don't want this night to be a total loss.
translation: CDress: 无论如何……[p/]我不想让今晚完全白费。

original: CDress: Come on.[p/] Dance with me.
translation: CDress: 来吧。[p/]和我跳支舞。

original: Tyrion: ...What?[p/] That's not really something I-
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？[p/]可是我——

original: CDress: Don't be like that.[p/] How often do we get to go to a party like this?
translation: CDress: 别这样。[p/]我们可不会经常参加这样的舞会，对吧？

original: Tyrion: I-
translation: Tyrion: 我——

original: Before you have a chance to object,[p/] she grabs your hand and starts dragging you to the middle of the room.
translation: 你还没来得及拒绝，[p/]她就抓住你的手，把你拖到了舞厅的中央。

original: You receive a few dirty looks from the aristocrats nearby.
translation: 附近的贵族不怀好意地看着你们。

original: Tyrion: C-[p/][s/]Celeste![p/][s/] People are staring at us...
translation: Tyrion: 塞、[p/][s/]塞莱斯特！[p/][s/]别人在盯着我们……

original: CDress: Who cares what they think?[p/] They're nobles.
translation: CDress: 管他们怎么想呢！[p/]他们是贵族。

original: CDress: They're going to hate us no matter what we do.
translation: CDress: 不管我们做什么都会讨厌我们。

original: She takes hold of your other hand and begins to pull you into a waltz.
translation: 她握住你的另一只手，拉着你跳起华尔兹。

original: Tyrion: I don't even know [i]how[/i] to dance...[p/] I've never done this before.
translation: Tyrion: 我甚至不知道该[i]怎么[/i]跳舞……[p/]我从来没跳过。

original: Celeste: It's easy.[p/] Just stop being so awkward about it.
translation: Celeste: 很简单的。[p/]放轻松就好。

original: That's easy for her to say...
translation: 她说起来倒是容易……

original: Tyrion: Alright...[p/] Just tell me what I need to do.
translation: Tyrion: 好吧……[p/]至少告诉我我该怎么做。

original: Celeste: Well, first...
translation: Celeste: 唔，首先……

original: Celeste: You need to be closer to me.
translation: Celeste: 你需要离我近一点。

original: With one swift motion,[p/] she pulls your body closer to hers.
translation: 她轻轻一动，[p/]将你的身体迅速拉向她。

original: Tyrion: ...!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: Celeste: Watch my movements and try to follow my lead.
translation: Celeste: 看我的动作然后试着跟我做。

original: Tyrion: Y-[p/][s/]You seem to know a lot about these things.
translation: Tyrion: 你、[p/][s/]你似乎对这些事情轻车熟路。

original: Celeste: I had to do a lot of networking when I was a mercenary.
translation: Celeste: 毕竟我做雇佣兵时不得不进行大量的社交活动。

original: Celeste: Do you know how many times I had to charm a merchant into hiring me?
translation: Celeste: 有不少次我都得施展魅力才能让商人雇用我，你知道吗？

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I see.
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我知道了。

original: You really don't know much about her, do you?
translation: 你真的不是很了解她，对吧？

original: You carefully watch the position of her feet and try to match her movements.
translation: 你仔细观察她的舞步，并试图配合她的动作。

original: After a while,[p/] you find yourself able to match her rhythm.
translation: 不久，[p/]你发现你能跟上她的节奏了。

original: But you still accidentally step on her foot every few beats.
translation: 但隔个几拍你还是会不小心踩到她。

original: She doesn't seem fazed by it.[p/] Either she's being polite or she genuinely doesn't feel anything.
translation: 她似乎并不觉得困扰。[p/]或许是出于礼貌，或许她真的没有任何感觉。

original: Celeste: ...You're getting it.[p/] But don't focus so much on where your feet are.
translation: Celeste: ……你学得很快。[p/]不过别太在意你的脚放在哪儿。

original: Celeste: Just look at me.
translation: Celeste: 看着我就好。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What?
translation: Tyrion: 什、[p/][s/]什么？

original: Celeste: Come on, do it.
translation: Celeste: 来嘛，看着我。

original: You try to break eye contact with her.[p/] But every time you do,[p/] you slowly find yourself being drawn back into her eyes.
translation: 你试图避开与她的眼神接触。[p/]但每当你这么做，[p/]都会慢慢地又被她的目光吸引回去了。

original: You feel so embarrassed that you're becoming lightheaded.[p/] And you find yourself perspiring more than usual.
translation: 你感到非常尴尬甚至头晕目眩。[p/]而且你发现自己比平时出了更多汗。

original: But at the same time...[p/] You don't have any urge to break away from her.
translation: 但与此同时……[p/]你没有任何想要摆脱她的冲动。

original: There's a comforting warmth behind all the anxiety you're feeling.
translation: 在你所有的焦虑背后，有一种安慰人心的温暖。

original: Celeste: Ah, [i]there[/i] he is![p/] The [i]infamous[/i] Tyrion Cuthbert.
translation: Celeste: 啊，他在[i]这儿[/i]！[i]臭名昭著[/i]的提利昂·卡斯伯特。

original: Celeste: Never turns away from challenging a noble...[p/] But can't dance a step to save his life.
translation: Celeste: 挑战贵族的权威从来不逃跑……[p/]但是让他跳舞一步也跳不了。

original: Her expression doesn't betray a hint of it.[p/] But you still detect feelings of nervousness from her.
translation: 她的表情毫无破绽。[p/]但你还是能察觉到她的紧张。

original: Is she just as flustered as you are?
translation: 她和你一样慌乱吗？

original: You find yourself relaxing a bit more.[p/] And you're somehow able to continue matching her movements.
translation: 你发现自己更放松了点。[p/]而且没来由地能继续跟上她的动作。

original: Celeste: See?[p/] There you go.
translation: Celeste: 看吧？[p/]你学会了。

original: Celeste: Although...
translation: Celeste: 尽管……

original: Tyrion: ...What is it?
translation: Tyrion: ……尽管什么？

original: Celeste: You know the man is supposed to lead, right?
translation: Celeste: 你知道通常应该是男士领舞，对吧？

original: Tyrion: ...Maybe I don't subscribe to gender stereotypes.
translation: Tyrion: ……或许我只是不赞成性别刻板印象。

original: Celeste: [i]Or[/i]...[p/] maybe you just suck at this.
translation: Celeste: [i]或者[/i]……可能你只是不擅长这个。

original: It's been a while since you've felt this calm.
translation: 你很久没有这么平静了。

original: There's always been something that you needed to prepare for.
translation: 你总是忙着准备这样或那样的事情。

original: A client that needed saving.[p/] A culprit that needed catching.
translation: 要帮助委托人。[p/]要抓住罪魁祸首。

original: But you're quite content with this one brief moment you're able to spend with her.
translation: 不过，能与她共度这短暂的一刻，你十分满足。

original: You almost find yourself getting lost in the mood.
translation: 你几乎沉醉其中。

original: ...Until you spot a familiar face,[p/] accompanied by a legion of knights.
translation: ……直到你看见一张熟悉的面孔，身边跟着一群骑士。

original: Tyrion: No...[p/] Don't tell me.
translation: Tyrion: 不……[p/]不会吧。

original: The knights storm their way toward where Beatrice and Aster are.
translation: 骑士们径直走向比亚特丽丝和阿斯特。

original: Several of the attendees take notice.[p/] They all stop what they're doing to see what's going on.
translation: 这引起了一些人的注意。[p/]他们都停下了手头的事情，想知道发生了什么。

original: Orym: Beatrice Frega![p/][s/] By the authority of the Wyverngarde crown,[p/][s/] you’re under arrest!
translation: Orym: 比亚特丽丝·弗雷加！[p/][s/]以维文加德皇室的名义，[p/][s/]你被捕了！

original: Did he just say Beatrice [i]Frega[/i]?!
translation: 他刚刚说比亚特丽丝·[i]弗雷加[/i]？！

original: CDress: ... [mind="Damn it... It was just getting good..."/]
translation: CDress: ……[mind="可恶……刚开始渐入佳境……"/]

original: CDress: We should go see what's happening, shouldn't we?
translation: CDress: 我们应该去看看发生了什么，是不是？

original: Tyrion: Y-[p/][s/]Yeah.[p/] Let's go.
translation: Tyrion: 是、[p/][s/]是的。[p/]走吧。

original: Aster: You are [i]completely[/i] out of line, Commander!
translation: Aster: 你<u>彻底</u>越界了，指挥官！

original: Aster: I thought I told you to stand down!
translation: Aster: 我想我已经命令你退下了！

original: Alaric: Do you not recognize who you're speaking to?!
translation: Alaric: 你难道不知道自己在跟谁说话吗？！

original: Alaric: Let go of Lady Frega!
translation: Alaric: 放开弗雷加小姐！

original: Orym: U-[p/][s/]Um...[p/] I can't really do that, Your Highnesses.
translation: Orym: 呃、[p/][s/]唔……[p/]我真的不能这么做，殿下。

original: Tyrion: Aster,[p/] what's going on?
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特，[p/]发生什么了？

original: Aster: It's Lord Frega.[p/] He was found murdered in his study.
translation: Aster: 是弗雷加勋爵。[p/]他在书房里死于谋杀。

original: Aster: And these cretins think that [i]Beatrice[/i] is behind it somehow!
translation: Aster: 然后这些傻瓜觉得是<u>比亚特丽丝</u>在背后搞鬼！

original: Orym: S-[p/][s/]Sorry, Your Highness.[p/] But my orders come straight from Steelwind.
translation: Orym: 抱、[p/][s/]抱歉，殿下。[p/]但是我直接听令于斯蒂尔文德。

original: Alaric: Lady Steelwind sent you?
translation: Alaric: 是斯蒂尔文德女士让你来的吗？

original: Beatrice: ...
translation: Beatrice: ……

original: Beatrice takes in a deep breath and claps her hands together.
translation: 比亚特丽丝深吸一口气，拍了一下手。

original: Beatrice: I should go with them.
translation: Beatrice: 我应该跟他们走。

original: Alaric: What?![p/][s/] No!
translation: Alaric: 什么？！[p/][s/]不！

original: Aster: My brother is right![p/] They have no right to-
translation: Aster: 阿拉里克是对的！[p/]他们没有权利——

original: Beatrice: I don't want to cause friction between you and Aria.
translation: Beatrice: 我不想让你和阿莉亚产生摩擦。

original: Beatrice: She's always been meticulous.[p/] I'm sure she's just being careful...
translation: Beatrice: 她一直都很谨慎。[p/]我确信她只是小心行事……

original: Beatrice: I'm sure I'll be exonerated once they've thoroughly investigated what happened.
translation: Beatrice: 我相信一旦他们彻底查清发生了什么，我就能洗脱罪名。

original: Aster: ...Okay.
translation: Aster: ……好吧。

original: Aster: Only if that's what you truly want.
translation: Aster: 如果这就是你真正想要的。

original: Alaric: What?![p/][s/] You can't just let them take her away!
translation: Alaric: 什么？！[p/][s/]你不能就这样让他们带走她！

original: Aster: ...Brother.[p/] She's correct.[p/] It is not our place to interfere with the laws of our kingdom.
translation: Aster: ……阿拉里克[p/]她是对的。[p/]我们不能干涉国家的法律。

original: Alaric: B-[p/][s/]But...
translation: Alaric: 但、[p/][s/]但是……

original: Aster: ...[i]However[/i].
translation: Aster: ……[i]不过[/i]。

original: Orym: ...Y-[p/][s/]Yes, Your Highness?
translation: Orym: ……是、[p/][s/]是的，殿下？

original: Aster: Ms. Beatrice is blind.[p/] One of your knights will need to escort her.
translation: Aster: 比亚特丽丝女士眼睛看不见。[p/]需要一位骑士护送她。

original: Orym: ...She's what?!
translation: Orym: ……她怎么了？！

original: Did he just say that she's [i]blind[/i]?!
translation: 他刚刚是说她<u>失明</u>了？！

original: Orym: Uh...[p/] Anyways,[p/] we're going to need to take you to a holding cell, lady.
translation: Orym: 呃……[p/]无论如何，[p/]我们需要把你带去拘留所，女士。

original: Orym: One of you should stay with her and guide her through-
translation: Orym: 你们得派人陪着她去——

original: Beatrice: Please.[p/] I may be disabled,[p/] but I'm not a child.
translation: Beatrice: 拜托。[p/]我或许是个残疾人，[p/]但我可不是个小孩子。

original: Beatrice walks past the knights and heads toward the foyer.
translation: 比亚特丽丝走过骑士们，向前厅走去。

original: It appears that she already knows the way out.
translation: 看来她已经知道出去的路了。

original: Orym: ...
translation: Orym: ……

original: Tyrion: ...Shouldn't you all be following her?
translation: Tyrion: ……你们不是应该跟着她？

original: Orym: R-[p/][s/]Right![p/][s/] Inquisition,[p/][s/] move out!
translation: Orym: 对、[p/][s/]对啊！[p/][s/]裁判所，[p/][s/]我们走！

original: You definitely didn't expect the night to go like this.
translation: 你完全没有想到今晚会变成这样。

original: Just what is going on here?
translation: 这里到底发生了什么？

original: Tyrion: These chandeliers look fancy enough to be worth a small fortune.
translation: Tyrion: 这些吊灯看起来足够华丽，应该价值不菲。

original: Celeste: The Banking Houses are loaded, aren't they?
translation: Celeste: 银行家们都很有钱，不是吗？

original: Tyrion: Each of these tables have a centerpiece of flowers on it.
translation: Tyrion: 每张桌子中央都摆着鲜花。

original: Celeste: To be honest,[p/] it kind of looks tacky.
translation: Celeste: 老实说，[p/]有点俗气。

original: Tyrion: Their notion of aesthetics must fly over the heads of peasants like us...
translation: Tyrion: 他们的美学造诣肯定是我们这样的平民难以理解的……

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: Are you worried about your missing sword?
translation: Tyrion: 你在担心那把丢失的剑吗？

original: Celeste: N-[p/][s/]No!
translation: Celeste: 没、[p/][s/]没有！

original: Celeste: Well, yes.[p/] I [i]am[/i] worried.
translation: Celeste: 好吧，是的。[p/]我[i]在[/i]担心。

original: Celeste: But I'm sure it'll turn up eventually.
translation: Celeste: 但我相信它最终会出现的。

original: She's trying her best to hide how worried she is.
translation: 她在竭力掩饰自己的担心。

original: You hope you're able to find her sword somewhere.
translation: 你希望你能在某个地方找到她的剑。

original: Celeste: A murder in a locked room.[p/] It's like something out of a mystery novel.
translation: Celeste: 密室谋杀。[p/]就像悬疑小说里的情节一样。

original: Tyrion: The murderer must have used something to break into Lord Frega's study.
translation: Tyrion: 凶手肯定用了什么东西闯入弗雷加勋爵的书房。

original: Tyrion: But what did they do?
translation: Tyrion: 但他们做了什么？

original: Celeste: It should be obvious, right?
translation: Celeste: 显而易见，对吧？

original: Celeste: They [i]had[/i] to have used the Sword of Spell Eating.
translation: Celeste: 他们[i]肯定[/i]用了噬法之剑。

original: Tyrion: That [i]is[/i] the most obvious answer.
translation: Tyrion: 那[i]确实是[/i]最明显的答案。

original: But is it the [i]correct[/i] answer?
translation: 但那是[i]正确[/i]答案吗？

original: Celeste: Laefe and Jan's testimonies don't give us much to go on.
translation: Celeste: 拉菲和简的证词没有给我们太多线索。

original: Celeste: We still have no idea who murdered Lord Frega [i]or[/i] who stole the Sword of Spell Eating.
translation: Celeste: 我们还是不知道是谁谋杀了弗雷加勋爵，也不知道是谁偷走了噬法之剑。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] But I feel like all of these facts fit together somehow.
translation: Tyrion: 是啊……[p/]但我觉得所有这些事实似乎以某种方式契合在一起。

original: Celeste: Well at least we were able to find my missing sword.
translation: Celeste: 至少我们找到了我丢失的剑。

original: But honestly,[p/] that just raises even more questions.
translation: 但老实说，[p/]这只会让人产生更多疑问。

original: Celeste: It sounds like a [i]bunch[/i] of people had a reason to murder Lord Frega.
translation: Celeste: 听起来有[i]一群[/i]人有理由谋杀弗雷加勋爵。

original: Tyrion: Yeah,[p/] and we still don't have any evidence that incriminates [i]any[/i] of them.
translation: Tyrion: 是的，[p/]但我们仍然没有任何证据证明他们中[i]有人[/i]有罪。

original: But this thread [i]has[/i] to lead somewhere.
translation: 但这条线索[i]肯定[/i]指向什么。

original: You just need to follow your leads and use your intuition.
translation: 你只需要跟随你的线索，运用你的直觉。

original: Tyrion: Lord Frega was planning to disinherit a lot of people that night...
translation: Tyrion: 弗雷加勋爵那晚打算剥夺很多人的继承权……

original: Celeste: And he died [i]before[/i] his revised will was submitted.
translation: Celeste: 而他在修改遗嘱[i]之前[/i]就死了。

original: Celeste: So technically his old will is going to be used to split up his assets.
translation: Celeste: 因此依照法律，会根据他的旧遗嘱分割他的资产。

original: That would be a pretty strong motive to murder him.
translation: 那会是谋杀他的一个强有力动机。

original: This is a placeholder.
translation: 这是一个占位符。

original: Celeste: Where should we go next?
translation: Celeste: 我们接下来去哪儿？

original: Tyrion: The body was supposedly found in Lord Frega's study on the top floor.
translation: Tyrion: 据说尸体是在顶层弗雷加勋爵的书房里被发现的。

original: Tyrion: We should probably start our investigation there.
translation: Tyrion: 我们或许应该从那里开始调查。

original: Tyrion: We have a lot of leads to follow up on.
translation: Tyrion: 我们有很多线索需要跟进。

original: Tyrion: Jan Hughes was apparently here last night.[p/] And he supposedly heard an altercation between Lord Frega and the murderer.
translation: Tyrion: 昨晚简·休斯就在这里。[p/]而且据说他听到了弗雷加勋爵和凶手之间的争吵。

original: Tyrion: And Laefe Frega was the last person to see Lord Frega alive before the lockdown.
translation: Tyrion: 此外拉菲·弗雷加是封锁前最后一个见到活着的弗雷加勋爵的人。

original: Tyrion: They both might have information we can use.
translation: Tyrion: 他们都可能有我们用得上信息。

original: Tyrion: I have a feeling that Laefe is hiding something.[p/] But I don't have the evidence to confront her yet.
translation: Tyrion: 我感觉拉菲隐瞒了什么。[p/]但我还没有足够的证据和她当面对质。

original: Tyrion: Supposedly,[p/] Lord von Sanctus had a decent motive to murder Lord Frega.
translation: Tyrion: 据传，[p/]冯·桑克图斯勋爵有充分的动机谋杀弗雷加勋爵。

original: Tyrion: I doubt he [i]actually[/i] did it.[p/] But he might be able to point us in the right direction.
translation: Tyrion: 我不觉得[i]真的[/i]付诸行动了。[p/]但他或许能为我们指明方向。

original: If you can even get him to cooperate, that is...
translation: 甚至如果能和他合作，那就……

original: Tyrion: Von Sanctus was surprisingly helpful.
translation: Tyrion: 冯·桑克图斯出乎意料地帮了大忙。

original: Tyrion: We should talk to Laefe again.
translation: Tyrion: 我们得再和拉菲谈谈。

original: Tyrion: We can use the new information we've gained to probe her.
translation: Tyrion: 我们可以利用新获得的信息来试探她。

original: Tyrion: And there's also Haroldson...
translation: Tyrion: 还有哈罗德森……

original: Tyrion: Even if he's not involved in this,[p/] I'd like to ask him a few more questions about the gallery's security.
translation: Tyrion: 虽然他和谋杀无关，[p/]但我想再问他几个关于画廊安全的问题。

original: Tyrion: That might help us figure out how the Sword of Spell Eating was stolen.
translation: Tyrion: 或许能帮我们弄清楚噬法之剑是怎么被偷走的。

original: Tyrion: There's still one last person we should speak with:[p/] Harold Haroldson.
translation: Tyrion: 最后我们还需要和一个人交谈：[p/]哈罗德·哈罗德森。

original: Celeste: ...I still refuse to believe [i]that's[/i] his actual name.
translation: Celeste: ……我还是不敢相信[i]那就是[/i]他的真名。

original: Tyrion: He would have the most details about the Sword of Spell Eating.[p/] And we would know about the abjuration wards that [i]should[/i] have protected it.
translation: Tyrion: 关于噬法之剑他应该最为了解。[p/]并且我们也能了解下那些[i]本该[/i]用来保护它的防护结界。

original: Celeste: There's also his inheritance.
translation: Celeste: 还有那些遗产。

original: Right.[p/] You don't want to suspect him,[p/] but you need to consider every possibility.
translation: 是的。[p/]尽管你不愿意怀疑他，[p/]但你需要考虑各种可能性。

original: Tyrion: We've found a lot of information.[p/] I'm sure Ms. Tymora will appreciate knowing about it.
translation: Tyrion: 我们找到了很多信息。[p/]我相信泰摩拉女士知道后会很高兴。

original: Tyrion: She's probably at the Barracks with Beatrice.
translation: Tyrion: 她可能和比亚特丽丝一起在收容处待着。

original: Tyrion: We'll probably find her there.
translation: Tyrion: 我们应该能在那里找到她。

original: Celeste: I can't believe the infamous Tyrion Cuthbert doesn't know how to do a simple waltz.
translation: Celeste: 我真不敢相信，臭名昭著的提利昂·卡斯伯特竟然连简单的华尔兹都不会跳。

original: Tyrion: ...There was never any need to learn how to.
translation: Tyrion: ……我也没必要学怎么跳华尔兹啊。

original: Celeste: How about it?[p/] Do you want to try dancing again?
translation: Celeste: 怎么样？[p/]你想再试着跳一次舞吗？

original: Tyrion: We're technically on a job right now.[p/] What will Aster say if he sees us messing around?
translation: Tyrion: 严格来说我们现在是在工作。 [p/]如果阿斯特看到我们在胡闹，他会说什么？

original: Celeste: Aw...[p/] You can be such a buzzkill sometimes.
translation: Celeste: 啊哦……[p/]你有时候真的很扫兴。

original: Celeste: How many cases have we done together now?
translation: Celeste: 我们一起办过多少案子了？

original: Tyrion: I don't know.[p/] I've honestly lost count.
translation: Tyrion: 我不知道。[p/]说实话，我已经数不清了。

original: Celeste: A year ago,[p/] I never would've guessed that I'd be the bodyguard of a lawyer.
translation: Celeste: 一年以前，[p/]我从没想过自己会成为一名律师的贴身护卫。

original: Tyrion: I really am glad to have you here with me.[p/] I have no idea how I'd defend all these cases alone.
translation: Tyrion: 我很高兴有你陪着我。[p/]如果没有你，我真不知道自己一个人怎么为案子辩护。

original: Celeste: Hehe.
translation: Celeste: 嘻嘻。

original: Tyrion: ...Just don't let that praise go to your head.
translation: Tyrion: ……别让那些赞扬冲昏了你的头脑。

original: Celeste: I'm not!
translation: Celeste: 我没有！

original: Tyrion: I noticed that you were teasing Steelwind earlier.
translation: Tyrion: 我注意到你刚刚在调侃斯蒂尔文德。

original: Celeste: W-[p/][s/]Well,[p/] she started it!
translation: Celeste: 怎、[p/][s/]怎么了，[p/]她先开始的！

original: Tyrion: ...By doing what?
translation: Tyrion: ……她干什么了？

original: Celeste: U-[p/][s/]Um...
translation: Celeste: 唔、[p/][s/]呃……

original: Celeste: ...It's none of your business.
translation: Celeste: ……和你没关系。

original: Tyrion: ...Okay?
translation: Tyrion: ......好吧？

original: Tyrion: I never would have imagined that we'd be on good terms with the Crown Prince of Wyverngarde.
translation: Tyrion: 我从没想过我们会和维文加德的王储殿下关系这么好。

original: Celeste: I'm surprised you even considered trusting him.[p/] I'd thought you, of all people, would hate anyone from the nobility.
translation: Celeste: 我很惊讶你居然会信任他。[p/]我原以为你是最不可能喜欢贵族的人。

original: Tyrion: ...I have an insight when it comes to gauging peoples' sincerity.
translation: Tyrion: ……在判断人们是否真诚时，我有自己的见解。

original: Celeste: I don't doubt that.[p/] But it's still pretty open-minded for you.
translation: Celeste:  我不怀疑这一点。[p/]但对你来说，这还是太开明了。

original: You suppose she has a point.
translation: 你觉得她说得有道理。

original: Tyrion: ...I'm glad Jan and the twins were able to find jobs after the Nightgrave case.
translation: Tyrion: ……我很高兴简和双胞胎能在奈特格雷夫一案后找到工作。

original: Tyrion: I still feel a little bit guilty about that.
translation: Tyrion: 我还是感觉有些内疚。

original: Celeste: Come on.[p/] You [i]had[/i] to indict Redmond to save Wallace.
translation: Celeste: 好啦。[p/]要想拯救华莱士你就[i]必须[/i]起诉雷德蒙。

original: Tyrion: I know...[p/] But it's hard not to feel responsible.
translation: Tyrion: 我知道……[p/]但很难不觉得自己有责任。

original: Tyrion: I never expected to see Wallace with Steelwind.
translation: Tyrion: 我完全没想到会看到华莱士和斯蒂尔文德一起。

original: Tyrion: I wonder why she'd choose him of all people as her aide?
translation: Tyrion: 我在想她为什么会选择他作为助手呢？

original: Celeste: Maybe she's trying to copy us.[p/] An attorney and a mage.
translation: Celeste: 也许她是在模仿我们。[p/]律师和法师的组合。

original: Tyrion: ...But she can already cast [b]Detect Magic[/b].
translation: Tyrion: ……但是她已经能施展[b]法术探测[/b]了。

original: Celeste: Come on![p/] That's not the [i]only[/i] thing I do!
translation: Celeste: 喂！[p/]那又不是我[i]唯一[/i]能做的！

original: Celeste: Beatrice has been through a lot, hasn't she?
translation: Celeste: 比亚特丽丝经历了很多，不是吗？

original: Tyrion: ...From what we've heard about her father's cold behavior,[p/] I don't blame her for leaving.
translation: Tyrion: ……从我们听到的她父亲的冷漠行为来看，[p/]我认为她离开家情有可原。

original: Tyrion: She probably wanted to leave her old life behind.
translation: Tyrion: 她可能想摆脱过去的生活。

original: You two are similar in that regard...
translation: 在这方面你们俩很相似……

original: Celeste: William Frega doesn't sound like the best person, does he?
translation: Celeste: 威廉·弗雷加听起来不是什么大好人，对吧？

original: Tyrion: Many people in Wyverngarde live in poverty...[p/] Yet [i]he's[/i] able to afford this extravagant house.
translation: Tyrion: 维文加德的许多人生活在贫困之中……[p/]但[i]他[/i]却能买得起这座奢华的房子。

original: Tyrion: You don't live a life like this without hoarding wealth for yourself.
translation: Tyrion: 你过着这样的生活，不可能不为自己积攒财富。

original: Celeste: Tyrion...
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……

original: Tyrion: ...But like anyone else,[p/] even [i]he[/i] deserves justice for his death.
translation: Tyrion: ……但是和其他人一样，[p/]即使[i]他[/i]这样的人的死也需要讨个公道。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: ...Are you still mad at Lord Steelwind?
translation: Tyrion: ……你还在生斯蒂尔文德勋爵的气吗？

original: Celeste: ...How could I not?[p/] He almost killed you.
translation: Celeste: ……为什么不！[p/]他几乎杀了你。

original: You really want them to make peace with each other.
translation: 你真希望他们能和平共处。

original: ...But it makes you a little happy that she's getting this angry on your account.
translation: ……不过，她因为你而发这么大的火，倒让你有点高兴。

original: Tyrion: Laefe is quite beautiful, isn't she?
translation: Tyrion: 拉菲很漂亮，不是吗？

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: ...Objectively speaking.
translation: Tyrion: ……客观地说。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……怎么了？

original: Celeste: Nothing. [mind="So that's what he likes..."/]
translation: Celeste: 没什么。 [mind="所以他喜欢那样的……"/]

original: You should probably change the subject.
translation: 你最好换个话题。

original: Celeste: Miriam seems different now.[p/] She's a lot less...[p/] arrogant.
translation: Celeste: 米莉亚姆现在看起来不太一样了。[p/]她好像没那么……[p/]傲慢了。

original: Tyrion: She must be going through a lot.
translation: Tyrion: 她一定经历了很多。

original: Tyrion: She unexpectedly lost her father [i]and[/i] her long-lost sister is being charged with murder.
translation: Tyrion: 她意外地失去了父亲，失散多年的姐姐被指控谋杀。

original: Celeste: "Harold Haroldson" [i]has[/i] to be some kind of stage name, right?
translation: Celeste: “哈罗德·哈罗德森”[i]应该[/i]是艺名之类的吧？

original: Celeste: Who would actually name their child that?!
translation: Celeste: 哪有人给孩子起这样的名字的？！

original: Tyrion: I think you're getting way too hung up on his name...
translation: Tyrion: 我觉得你对他的名字过于纠结了……

original: Celeste: Like...[p/] Did he [i]also[/i] name his children that?[p/] Does he have children?
translation: Celeste: 那……[p/]他也给孩子取了那样的名字吗？[p/]他有孩子吗？

original: Tyrion: ...He has a pet monkey.
translation: Tyrion: ……他有一只宠物猴。

original: Celeste: You're just making things up now.
translation: Celeste: 你这会儿只是在胡编乱造。

original: Celeste: A sword forged by a demon.[p/] Do you think the legends are true?
translation: Celeste: 一把由恶魔锻造的剑。[p/]你以为传说都是真的吗？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Celeste: ...Tyrion?
translation: Celeste: ……提利昂？

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Oh,[p/] sorry.[p/] I just got a little distracted.
translation: Tyrion: 哦、[p/][s/]哦，[p/]抱歉。[p/]我刚刚有点分神了。

original: The Eye of Horus can't possibly be demonic...[p/] Can it?
translation: 荷鲁斯之眼不可能和恶魔有关……吧？

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: Are you worried about your missing sword?
translation: Tyrion: 你在担心那把丢失的剑吗？

original: Celeste: N-[p/][s/]No!
translation: Celeste: 没、[p/][s/]没有！

original: Celeste: Well, yes.[p/] I [i]am[/i] worried.
translation: Celeste: 好吧，是的。[p/]我[i]在[/i]担心。

original: Celeste: But I'm sure it'll turn up eventually.
translation: Celeste: 但我相信它最终会出现的。

original: She's trying her best to hide how worried she is.
translation: 她在竭力掩饰自己的担心。

original: You hope you're able to find her sword somewhere.
translation: 你希望你能在某个地方找到她的剑。

original: Celeste: I'm glad we found Crimson Lotus.
translation: Celeste: 我很高兴我们找到了绯莲。

original: Tyrion: Is that the name of your sword?
translation: Tyrion: 那是你的剑的名字吗？

original: Celeste: Yep!
translation: Celeste: 对啊！

original: You're glad that she's cheered up.[p/] But how did her sword end up under Beatrice's bed?
translation: 你很高兴她振作了起来。[p/]但是她的剑怎么会在比亚特丽丝的床底下呢？

original: Celeste: I could never imagine marrying someone for diplomatic reasons...
translation: Celeste: 我永远无法想象出于外交原因而与某人结婚……

original: Celeste: It just sounds so sad.
translation: Celeste: 这听起来很悲哀。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] Although,[p/] I suppose Prosecutor Steelwind lucked out in that regard.
translation: Tyrion: 是啊……[p/]不过，[p/]我想检察官斯蒂尔文德在这方面还算走运。

original: Celeste: I can't believe Aster [i]still[/i] thinks she hates him.
translation: Celeste: 真不敢相信阿斯特[i]还[/i]认为她讨厌他。

original: Tyrion: I know...[p/] I don't understand how anyone could be [i]that[/i] oblivious to someone else's feelings.
translation: Tyrion: 我知道……[p/]我不明白怎么会有人对别人的感情[i]那么[/i]迟钝。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: You feel a sharp pain in your side as Celeste quickly jabs you.
translation: 塞莱斯特迅速戳了你一下，你感觉一阵剧痛。

original: Tyrion: Ow![p/] What was [i]that[/i] for?
translation: Tyrion: 噢！[p/]这是为什么？

original: Celeste: ...Nothing.
translation: Celeste: ……不为什么。

original: Celeste: I've never really liked dogs...
translation: Celeste: 我一直不太喜欢狗……

original: Tyrion: ...What?![p/][s/] How could you [i]say[/i] that?!
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？！[p/][s/]你怎么能这么说？！

original: Tyrion: Don't tell me you're a cat person.
translation: Tyrion: 别告诉我你是猫派。

original: Celeste: Well, yeah.[p/] They're [i]so[/i] much better than dogs.
translation: Celeste: 那当然。[p/]猫比狗好[i]多[/i]了。

original: Tyrion: ...It's like I don't even know who you are anymore.
translation: Tyrion: ……感觉我完全不认识你了。

original: Tyrion: Cats are fickle and will lash out at you for the [i]smallest[/i] things!
translation: Tyrion: 猫是善变的，甚至会因为[i]一点点[/i]小事就朝你发脾气！

original: Celeste: You have to [s/][i]work[/i] for a cat's affection.[p/] Dogs will cling to and worship the first person that's friendly to them.
translation: Celeste: 你必须[s/][i]努力[/i]才能赢得猫的喜爱。[p/]而狗会紧紧依附并崇拜第一个对它们友好的人。

original: Tyrion: Dogs are loyal companions![p/][s/] No matter what happens,[p/][s/] they'll always stand by your side to protect you!
translation: Tyrion: 狗是忠诚的伙伴！[p/][s/]无论发生什么，[p/][s/]它们都会站在你身边保护你！

original: Celeste: *sigh*[p/] I guess we'll just have to agree to disagree.
translation: Celeste: *叹气*[p/]我想我们只能各持己见了。

original: Tyrion: What do you think about [i]this[/i], Celeste?
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特，你怎么看？

original: Celeste: ...Sorry, Tyrion.
translation: Celeste: ……对不起，提利昂。

original: Celeste: I don't think I can help you with that.
translation: Celeste: 这一点我帮不上忙。

original: Tyrion: I can't believe they kept us here until noon.
translation: Tyrion: 我不敢相信他们要把我们留到中午。

original: The Lords' Ball was already running well into the night,[p/] even [i]before[/i] the murder occurred.
translation: 在谋杀发生之前，[p/]勋爵的舞会就已经持续到深夜了。

original: You'd like nothing more than to catch up on your lost sleep...[p/] But you made a promise to Aster.
translation: 你最想做的事就是补上你失去的睡眠……[p/]但你答应了阿斯特。

original: Aster: This doesn't make any sense.
translation: Aster: 这说不通。

original: Aster: Beatrice was with me and my brother the entire night.
translation: Aster: 比亚特丽丝一整晚都和我还有阿拉里克待在一起。

original: Right...[p/] You were there when she met with him and Steelwind.
translation: 确实……[p/]她遇到阿斯特和斯蒂尔文德时你也在那里。

original: Aster: She couldn't have stolen the Sword of Spell Eating [i]and[/i] have murdered her father.
translation: Aster: 她不可能偷走了噬法之剑[i]并且[/i]杀害了她的父亲。

original: Tyrion: I don't understand...
translation: Tyrion: 我不明白……

original: Tyrion: Of all the people that could have done this,[p/] why would Steelwind suspect a blind woman?
translation: Tyrion: 那么多人可能做这件事，[p/]斯蒂尔文德为什么会怀疑一位失明的女士？

original: Aster: ...
translation: Aster: ……

original: Aster: Mr. Cuthbert,[p/] could you defend Beatrice against these awful charges?
translation: Aster: 卡斯伯特先生，[p/]你能为比亚特丽丝辩护，反驳那些糟糕的指控吗？

original: Tyrion: I don't think I even [i]need[/i] to.
translation: Tyrion: 我觉得甚至不[i]需要[/i]辩护。

original: Aster: ...What?
translation: Aster: ……什么？

original: CDress: Beatrice is Ruby's client.[p/] I'm sure that [i]she'll[/i] be the one defending her.
translation: CDress: 比亚特丽丝是鲁比的委托人。[p/]我确信<u>她</u>会为比亚特丽丝辩护。

original: Aster: Well...[p/] That certainly puts my mind at ease.
translation: Aster: 好吧……[p/]这样我就放心了。

original: Aster: ...
translation: Aster: ……

original: Tyrion: What's wrong?
translation: Tyrion: 怎么了？

original: Aster: I don't know if I'm asking too much.[p/] But could you still investigate the crime scene for me, Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Aster: 我不知道我的要求是否过分。[p/]但还能请你为我调查犯罪现场吗，卡斯伯特先生？

original: Tyrion: ...What?[p/] But we just said that Ms. Tymora will-
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？[p/]可是我们刚说过泰摩拉女士会——

original: Aster: I know.[p/] And I don't doubt her abilities.
translation: Aster: 我知道。[p/]而且我不怀疑她的能力。

original: Aster: But Beatrice is a dear friend of mine.[p/] I'd like every chance for her to be found innocent.
translation: Aster: 但比亚特丽丝是我的挚友，[p/]我希望无论如何都要还她清白。

original: He said that she was a "dear friend"...[p/] They must know each other since she's a Frega.
translation: 他称呼她为“挚友”……想必她还是弗雷加的时候他们就认识了。

original: But why would Ms. Tymora, of all people, represent a member of a noble house?
translation: 但为什么泰摩拉女士会作为一个贵族家庭成员的代表呢？

original: There are still a lot of things you don't know about her.
translation: 你对她还有很多不了解的地方。

original: Aster: Of course,[p/] I'll also compensate you for your services.
translation: Aster: 当然，[p/]我会给你一些报酬。

original: Alaric: Consider yourself blessed.[p/] A commoner like you could only dream of a job like this.
translation: Alaric: 感恩戴德吧。[p/]像你这样的平民做梦才能得到这份工作。

original: Aster: Alaric...
translation: Aster:阿拉里克……

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: The tiny prince has a point, though...[p/] A payment from the Crown Prince [i]does[/i] sound tempting.
translation: 不过，小王子说得也有道理……[p/]王储殿下的报酬听起来[i]确实[/i]很诱人。

original: Celeste: I can't believe this...
translation: Celeste: 真是难以置信……

original: Celeste returns to the ballroom.[p/] She's changed back into her normal clothes.
translation: 塞莱斯特回到舞厅。[p/]她已经换回了平时的衣服。

original: Tyrion: What's wrong?
translation: Tyrion: 怎么了？

original: Celeste: The people in the coat room said that they couldn't find my sword!
translation: Celeste: 衣帽间的人说他们找不到我的剑了！

original: Celeste: They told me that someone must have stolen it!
translation: Celeste: 他们告诉我肯定是有人把它偷走了！

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Why would someone want to steal Celeste's sword?
translation: 为什么会有人想偷走塞莱斯特的剑？

original: Aside from your group,[p/] everyone else at the Ball was an aristocrat.
translation: 除了你们一行人，[p/]舞会上的其他人都是贵族。

original: You [i]do[/i] recall her saying that it was forged in the Eastern Kingdoms.
translation: 你[i]确实[/i]记得她说过那把剑是在东方古国锻造的。

original: Someone might have stolen it because of its rarity.
translation: 也许有人因为它的稀有偷走了它。

original: Tyrion: We can probably keep an eye out for it while we investigate the manor.
translation: Tyrion: 我们可以在调查庄园的时候留意一下。

original: Tyrion: This might all just be some kind of mistake.
translation: Tyrion: 这可能只是个误会。

original: Celeste: I hope so...
translation: Celeste: 希望如此……

original: Celeste: But anyways...[p/] Where should we start first?
translation: Celeste: 不管怎么说……[p/]我们应该先从哪里开始呢？

original: Tyrion: We should head to the crime scene.
translation: Tyrion: 我们应该先去犯罪现场。

original: Celeste: I remember hearing that they found Lord Frega's body in his Study.
translation: Celeste: 我记得他们说弗雷加勋爵的尸体是在他的书房发现的。

original: Celeste: Let's go over there.
translation: Celeste: 我们去那边吧。

original: Tyrion: These chandeliers look fancy enough to be worth a small fortune.
translation: Tyrion: 这些吊灯看起来足够华丽，应该价值不菲。

original: Celeste: The Banking Houses are loaded, aren't they?
translation: Celeste: 银行家们都很有钱，不是吗？

original: Tyrion: Each of these tables have a centerpiece of flowers on it.
translation: Tyrion: 每张桌子中央都摆着鲜花。

original: Celeste: To be honest,[p/] it kind of looks tacky.
translation: Celeste: 老实说，[p/]有点俗气。

original: Tyrion: Their notion of aesthetics must fly over the heads of peasants like us.
translation: Tyrion: 他们的美学造诣肯定是我们这样的平民难以理解的。

original: Celeste: I just can't wrap my head around it.[p/] Beatrice murdered her own father for what?[p/] Wealth and power?
translation: Celeste: 我还是想不明白。[p/]比亚特丽丝为什么要杀害自己的父亲呢？[p/]为了财富和权力吗？

original: Tyrion: That's just how the aristocracy works.
translation: Tyrion: 这就是贵族的行事方式。

original: Tyrion: Even the weakest noble has a large amount of political power.
translation: Tyrion: 即便是最弱小的贵族也拥有大量的政治权力。

original: Celeste: Sometimes I feel lucky that I grew up in Kornhaven.
translation: Celeste: 有时候我很庆幸自己在科尔哈文长大。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: She's been in a bad mood since you met Lord Steelwind.
translation: 自从你见到斯蒂尔文德勋爵后，她的心情就一直不太好。

original: Hopefully,[p/] the investigation might take her mind off of what happened.
translation: 希望调查能让她暂时忘记发生的事情。

original: ...But you can't help but feel a bit happy that she got that angry for your sake.
translation: ......但你不禁有点高兴，因为她是为了你才那么生气的。

original: Celeste: Why didn't you tell me that you could [i]talk[/i] to animals?
translation: Celeste: 你为什么不告诉我你能和动物[i]交谈[/i]？

original: Tyrion: U-[p/][s/]Uh...[p/] Well, you never asked.
translation: Tyrion: 额、[p/][s/]额……好吧，你没问过。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: You wonder if you should tell her about the Eye of Horus.[p/] She's more than earned your trust.
translation: 你在想是否应该告诉她关于荷鲁斯之眼的事。[p/]她完全值得你的信任。

original: But you can think about that later.[p/] For now,[p/] you need to focus on the investigation.
translation: 但你可以稍后再考虑那件事。[p/]目前，[p/]你需要专注于调查。

original: Celeste: Where should we go next?
translation: Celeste: 我们接下来去哪儿？

original: Tyrion: William retreated into his study to draft a new will.
translation: Tyrion: 威廉回到他的书房准备起草一份新遗嘱。

original: Tyrion: Even if it's not valid,[p/] we should try to look for it there.
translation: Tyrion: 即使它不具有法律效力，我们也应该在那里找找它。

original: Tyrion: It might give us some insight into the headspace he was in that night.
translation: Tyrion: 或许能让我们对他当晚的精神状态有所了解。

original: Tyrion: We sent the Inquisition to investigate the theft of the Sword.
translation: Tyrion: 让裁判所去调查失窃的噬法之剑。

original: Tyrion: Maybe we should check Beatrice's Bedroom to see if they've found anything.
translation: Tyrion: 也许我们应该去检查下比亚特丽丝的卧室，看看他们有没有发现什么。

original: Tyrion: Tracker supposedly found the Sword of Spell Eating lying in a hallway.
translation: Tyrion:  据说追追在走廊里发现了噬法之剑。

original: Tyrion: There has to be a reason why it was there.
translation: Tyrion: 它不可能无缘无故出现在那里。

original: Tyrion: If we go there,[p/] we might finally find the evidence we need to win this case.
translation: Tyrion: 如果我们去那里，[p/]也许最后就能找到赢得这个案子需要的证据。

original: You return to the ballroom and take a moment to recover.
translation: 你回到舞厅，稍事休息。

original: You spot Commander White at the edge of the room.[p/] But you don't pay him much notice.
translation: 你在舞厅的边缘看到了怀特指挥官。[p/]但你没太注意他。

original: It takes you a while before you feel ready to stand.
translation: 过了好一会儿，你才感觉能站起来。

original: Celeste: You okay?
translation: Celeste: 你还好吗？

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] I just needed a moment.
translation: Tyrion: 还好……[p/]只是需要点时间。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] the will reading bought us a few more hours to investigate the murder.
translation: Tyrion: 无论如何，[p/]遗嘱的宣读为我们争取了更多时间来调查这起谋杀案。

original: Tyrion: We should take advantage of the new information we just learned.
translation: Tyrion: 我们应该利用刚刚得知的新信息。

original: Orym: So...[p/] Where should we start first?
translation: Orym: 那么……[p/]我们该从哪里开始呢？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Right...[p/] [i]You're[/i] the prosecutor now.[p/] So that would technically make you his boss for the time being.
translation: 对啊……[p/][i]你[/i]现在是检察官了。[p/]所以严格来说你现在是他的上司。

original: Orym: ...
translation: Orym: ……

original: Orym: ...This is weird, right?
translation: Orym: ……有点奇怪，对吧？

original: Celeste: Yep.
translation: Celeste: 没错。

original: Tyrion: Awkwardness aside,[p/] I've never really led a task force before...
translation: Tyrion: 抛开尴尬不说，[p/]我之前从没真正领导过一个特别行动小组……

original: Tyrion: What would Steelwind normally do in this situation?
translation: Tyrion: 这种情况下斯蒂尔文德通常会怎么做？

original: Orym: Well,[p/] she'd normally have us investigate areas of interest.
translation: Orym: 呃，[p/]她通常会让我们调查感兴趣的地方。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] The context of the investigation tends to change after each round of court proceedings.
translation: Tyrion: 好吧……[p/]随着诉讼的进行，调查的情况往往也会发生变化。

original: Tyrion: Well,[p/] we're lacking a lot of physical evidence.
translation: Tyrion: 唔，[p/]我们缺少很多物证。

original: Tyrion: Could you and the Inquisition search the gallery and Beatrice's room?
translation: Tyrion: 你能和裁判所一起搜查下画廊和比亚特丽丝的卧室吗？

original: Tyrion: Perhaps you can find evidence of how the Sword of Spell Eating was stolen.
translation: Tyrion: 也许你能找到关于噬法之剑是如何被盗的证据。

original: Orym: Whatever you say, "boss".
translation: Orym: 任凭吩咐，“老大”。

original: Celeste: That covers the Inquisition.[p/] But what are [i]we[/i] going to do?
translation: Celeste: 裁判所安排好了。[p/]那我们要做什么呢？

original: Tyrion: It's clear that Lord Frega's inheritance plays a large role in this case.
translation: Tyrion: 很明显弗雷加勋爵的遗产在这个案子中起着重大作用。

original: Tyrion: Even if it's not valid,[p/] we should take a look at the modified will that he was drafting.
translation: Tyrion: 即使它不具有法律效力，[p/]我们也应该看看他正在起草的修改后的遗嘱。

original: Tyrion: It might give us some insight about what he was [i]really[/i] planning to do with his inheritance.
translation: Tyrion: 我们或许能通过它对弗雷加勋爵处理遗产的[i]真正[/i]打算有所了解。

original: Several gold-tinted chandeliers hang from the ceiling of the ballroom.
translation: 几盏金色的吊灯悬挂在舞厅的天花板上。

original: They look fancy enough to be worth a small fortune.
translation: 它们看起来华丽且价值不菲。

original: It irks you a little how much wealth Lord Frega must be hoarding to afford all of this.
translation: 弗雷加勋爵必须囤积大量财富才能负担得起这一切，这让你有点恼火。

original: Each table has a centerpiece of flowers on it.
translation: 每张桌子中央都摆着鲜花。

original: Most of the seats at the tables are filled.[p/] It doesn't look like you'll be able to play here.
translation: 桌子的大多数座位都坐满了。[p/]看来你不能在这里下棋。

original: You arrive at the dungeon and search for Ms. Tymora.
translation: 你来到地牢寻找泰摩拉女士。

original: She wasn't at the crime scene.[p/] So she must be here to discuss the case with Beatrice.
translation: 她不在犯罪现场。[p/]那她一定在这里和比亚特丽丝讨论这个案子。

original: ...Or at least that's what you thought,[p/] but you don't see her anywhere.
translation: ……至少你是这么想的，[p/]但你没有找到她。

original: Beatrice: Oh?[p/] Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Beatrice: 哦？[p/]卡斯伯特先生？

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Oh...[p/] Hi.
translation: Tyrion: 哦、[p/][s/]呃……[p/]你好。

original: You were so caught up in your thoughts.[p/] You didn't notice that you were walking right in front of Beatrice's cell.
translation: 你沉浸在自己的思绪中。[p/]没注意到自己走到了比亚特丽丝牢房的正前方。

original: Eris: I didn't expect to see you here.
translation: Eris: 我没想到会在这里见到你。

original: Celeste: A-[p/][s/]Ah!
translation: Celeste: 哎、[p/][s/]哎呀！

original: Celeste lets out a shriek as Eris approaches you two from behind.
translation: 厄莉斯从你们身后靠近时，塞莱斯特发出了一声尖叫。

original: For a split second,[p/] you see her hand dart towards her sword.
translation: 一瞬间，[p/]你看到她的手迅速伸向她的剑。

original: It appears that she still hasn't gotten over her instinctual fear of Eris.
translation: 看来她仍然没有克服对厄莉斯本能的恐惧。

original: Tyrion: ...Eris?[p/][s/] What are you doing here?
translation: Tyrion: ……厄莉斯？[p/][s/]你在这里做什么?

original: Eris: Ah...[p/] Beatrice is actually an acquaintance of my father.
translation: Eris: 呃……[p/]比亚特丽丝其实是我父亲的熟识。

original: Eris: He sent me here to help her through this ordeal.
translation: Eris: 他派我来这里帮助她度过这场磨难。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: [i]That[/i] brings up many more questions.[p/] But you don't really have time to pull on that thread.
translation: [i]这[/i]引出了更多的问题。[p/]但你完全没有时间继续追问下去。

original: You have less than an hour before the trial begins.[p/] You need to find Ms. Tymora.
translation: 在庭审开始前你还有不到一个小时的时间。[p/]你得找到泰摩拉女士。

original: Tyrion: Have either of you seen Ms. Tymora?[p/] I have some things to share with her.
translation: Tyrion: 你们有人见到泰摩拉女士了吗？[p/]我需要和她分享一些线索。

original: Beatrice: Ah.[p/] She was just here...[p/] But she left to retrieve some documents from her office.
translation: Beatrice: 啊。[p/]她刚刚还在这里……[p/]但她离开去办公室取一些文件了。

original: Tyrion: Do you have any idea when she'll be back?
translation: Tyrion: 你知道她什么时候回来吗？

original: Beatrice: She didn't say...[p/] But if your discussion has something to do with the case,[p/] I could pass a message on to her.
translation: Beatrice: 她没说……[p/]不过如果你们的讨论和这个案子有关，[p/]我可以给她带个口信。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You feel a little hesitant for some reason.[p/] But it [i]is[/i] her life on the line.
translation: 你不知为何感到有些犹豫。[p/]但她[i]确实[/i]命悬一线。

original: If anyone should know about what you've found during your investigation,[p/] it's her.
translation: 如果有人应该知道你在调查中发现了什么，[p/]那非她莫属。

original: Tyrion: Okay,[p/] let me tell you what I know.
translation: Tyrion: 好吧，[p/]我会告诉你我的发现。

original: You spend some time going through your findings with Beatrice.
translation: 你花了一些时间和比亚特丽丝一起回顾你的发现。

original: From your list of suspects,[p/] to the possible motives behind the murder.
translation: 从你的嫌疑人名单，[p/]到谋杀背后的可能动机。

original: You notice that with each revelation,[p/] she becomes more uneasy.
translation: 你注意到每透露一个信息，[p/]她都会变得更加不安。

original: The idea of someone framing her must be stressing her out.
translation: 有人想要陷害她，这一想法肯定让她很紧张。

original: Beatrice: I...[p/] see.[p/] You've certainly been very thorough.
translation: Beatrice: 我……[p/]明白了。[p/]你调查得非常仔细。

original: Tyrion: Yes.[p/] But I still have no concrete evidence that points to anyone.
translation: Tyrion: 是的。[p/]但我还是没有指向任何人的具体证据。

original: Beatrice: Hm... [mind="We underestimated him. If he reveals these findings to Prince Aster, he might suspect something."/]
translation: Beatrice: 嗯……[mind="我们低估了他，如果他把这些发现告诉阿斯特，他可能会起疑心。"/]

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: Beatrice: ...Sorry,[p/] I was just deep in thought.
translation: Beatrice: ……抱歉，[p/]我刚才陷入了沉思。

original: And [i]you[/i] were able to catch one of those thoughts.
translation: 而[i]你[/i]抓住了其中一个想法。

original: Tyrion: ...Beatrice.[p/] I'm sure you're aware that Prince Aster has your best interests at heart.
translation: Tyrion: ……比亚特丽丝。[p/]我相信你知道阿斯特王子在为你着想。

original: Beatrice: I know.[p/] Even though we haven't spoken for the last five years,[p/] I still consider him a dear friend.
translation: Beatrice: 我知道。[p/]尽管我们已经五年没说过话了，[p/]我仍然认为他是我的挚友。

original: Tyrion: Then I suppose you have no issue with me sharing these findings with him.
translation: Tyrion: 那么我想你不会反对我和他分享这些发现吧。

original: Beatrice: ...Of course not. [mind="This is bad. Even he wouldn't support us if he knew that I was involved."/]
translation: Beatrice: ……当然不会。[mind="这太糟糕了。如果知道我参与其中，即便是他也不会支持我们。"/]

original: Wait...[p/][s/] What was that?!
translation: 等等……[p/][s/]什么意思？！

original: Her thoughts just said that she was involved...
translation: 她的想法刚刚说她参与了……

original: Did she...[p/][s/] actually murder her father?!
translation: 她……[p/][s/]真的杀了她的父亲？！

original: Eris: Is something wrong, Mr. Cuthbert?[p/] You look a little pale.
translation: Eris: 怎么了，卡斯伯特先生？[p/]你脸色不太好。

original: Beatrice was actually behind this?![p/][s/] But how?!
translation: 比亚特丽丝实际上是这件事的幕后黑手？！[p/][s/]但是怎么会呢？！

original: She's completely blind![p/][s/] She couldn't have navigated through the manor [i]and[/i] avoided the guards.
translation: 她完全失明了！[p/][s/]她不可能穿过庄园并避开守卫。

original: No...[p/] You must be taking her thoughts out of context.[p/] [i]That's[/i] it.
translation: 不……[p/]你肯定是在断章取义地理解她的想法。[p/]就是这样。

original: Beatrice: Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] Perhaps you should get some rest.[p/] You look dreadfully tired.
translation: Beatrice: 卡斯伯特先生。[p/]或许你应该休息一下。[p/]你看起来非常疲惫。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You think very carefully about what to say next.
translation: 你仔细斟酌接下来要说什么。

original: There's [i]one[/i] way to get a certain answer through the Eye.[p/] But if you're wrong...
translation: 有一个办法可以通过荷鲁斯之眼得到确切的答案。[p/]但是如果你错了……

original: Tyrion: Beatrice...[p/] You weren't [i]actually[/i] involved in this, were you?
translation: Tyrion: 比亚特丽丝……[p/]你[i]实际上[/i]并没有参与谋杀，对吗？

original: Celeste: Tyrion...?
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……？

original: You see her gaze narrow in response to your question.
translation: 你看到她的目光在回应你的问题时变得锐利。

original: Once again,[p/] she claps her hands together.[p/] She's clearly trying to stay calm.
translation: 再一次，[p/]她拍了一下手。[p/]她显然在努力保持冷静。

original: Beatrice: *sigh*[p/] Do [i]you[/i] suspect me now, Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Beatrice: *叹气*[p/][i]你[/i]现在是在怀疑我吗，卡斯伯特先生？

original: Tyrion: ...You didn't answer my question, Beatrice.
translation: Tyrion: ……你没有回答我的问题，比亚特丽丝。

original: Beatrice: As if I'd even need to justify it with a response.
translation: Beatrice: 好像我需要回答什么来为此辩解一样。

original: Beatrice: But no, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] I was not responsible for my father's murder. [mind="At least, not directly... I was technically an accomplice."/]
translation: Beatrice: 但是不需要，卡斯伯特先生。[p/]我对我父亲的谋杀案不负有责任。[mind="至少，没有直接责任……只能说我是同谋。"/]

original: "An accomplice"...[p/][s/] Did she work together with someone?!
translation: “同谋”……[p/][s/]她和谁一起下手的吗？！

original: Ruby: ...Cuthbert?
translation: Ruby: ……卡斯伯特？

original: Tyrion: M-[p/][s/]Ms. Tymora?!
translation: Tyrion: 泰、[p/][s/]泰摩拉女士？！

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Your mentor seems to have sensed the mood in the air.[p/] She raises an eyebrow at you.
translation: 你的导师似乎察觉到了空气中的氛围。[p/]她朝你扬起了眉毛。

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora...[p/] Can I speak with you alone for a second?
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士……[p/]我能单独和你聊聊吗？

original: Ruby: ...Okay?
translation: Ruby: ……行啊？

original: Ruby: What's wrong?[p/] Is everything okay?
translation: Ruby: 怎么了？[p/]一切都还好吗？

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora![p/] Beatrice,[p/] she...
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士！[p/]比亚特丽丝，[p/]她……

original: Tyrion: She actually [i]did[/i] murder William Frega!
translation: Tyrion: 她[i]真的[/i]谋杀了威廉·弗雷加！

original: Ms. Tymora's gaze narrows.[p/] Her eyes dart around the room to make sure the guards didn't overhear you.
translation: 泰摩拉女士的目光变得锐利起来。[p/]她的眼睛在房间里四处扫视，以确保守卫没有听到你的话。

original: Ruby: What are you talking about?[p/] How could you [i]possibly[/i] know that?
translation: Ruby: 你在说些什么？[p/]你怎么可能知道？

original: Tyrion: I...[p/] I used the Eye of Horus on her.
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]我对她用了荷鲁斯之眼。

original: Tyrion: She conspired with someone else to orchestrate William Frega's death.
translation: Tyrion: 她和其他人合谋策划了威廉·弗雷加的死亡。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: Have you told anyone else about this?
translation: Ruby: 你和其他人说过这件事吗？

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No...[p/] It's not as if they'd believe me, anyways.
translation: Tyrion: 没、[p/][s/]没有……[p/]反正他们也不会相信我。

original: Tyrion: You're the only other person who knows about my abilities.
translation: Tyrion: 你是唯一知道我能力的人。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: Okay...[p/] Just stay quiet about this for the time being.
translation: Ruby: 好吧……[p/]现在先对这件事保持沉默。

original: Ruby: Anyways,[p/] I need to get ready.[p/] The trial starts in half an hour.
translation: Ruby: 总之，[p/]我需要做好准备。[p/]庭审会在半小时后开始。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What-?!
translation: Tyrion: 什、[p/][s/]什么——？！

original: Tyrion: You're not seriously going to defend her, are you?!
translation: Tyrion: 你真的要为她辩护吗？！

original: Ruby: Of course I am.[p/] I'm her attorney.
translation: Ruby: 当然。[p/]我是她的律师。

original: Tyrion: But she's guilty![p/][s/] I [i]saw[/i] it!
translation: Tyrion: 但是她有罪！[p/][s/]我[i]看到[/i]了！

original: Ruby: Look.[p/] At this point,[p/] I don't know [i]what[/i] you saw.
translation: Ruby: 听着。[p/]关于这一点，[p/]我不知道你看到了[i]什么[/i]。

original: Ruby: Do you think I can just abandon a client minutes before a trial?
translation: Ruby: 你认为我会在开庭前几分钟放弃委托人吗？

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No,[p/] but-
translation: Tyrion: 没、[p/][s/]没有，[p/]但是——

original: Ruby: It's not for either of us to decide who's guilty and who's not.[p/] [i]Everyone[/i] has a right to an attorney.
translation: Ruby: 谁有罪、谁无罪，不是由我们来决定的。[p/][i]每个人[/i]都有权聘请律师。

original: Ruby: Our court system needs a defense attorney and a prosecutor to keep things fair.
translation: Ruby: 我们的司法体系需要一名辩护律师和一名检察官来保持公平。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Ruby: More importantly,[p/] you had no right to use the Eye of Horus on [i]my[/i] client without my permission.
translation: Ruby: 更重要的是，[p/]未经我的许可，你无权对<u>我的</u>委托人使用荷鲁斯之眼。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What?![p/][s/] B-[p/][s/]But-!
translation: Tyrion: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！[p/][s/]可、[p/][s/]可是——！

original: Ruby: I don't have time to argue about this.[p/] We [i]will[/i] be talking about this later.
translation: Ruby: 我没有时间和你争论这个。[p/]我们稍后再谈。

original: Before you have a chance to respond,[p/] Ms. Tymora walks away.
translation: 你还没来得及反应，泰摩拉女士就走开了。

original: Celeste sees both of you and awkwardly approaches you.
translation: 塞莱斯特看到了你们俩，尴尬地向你们走来。

original: Celeste: Hey, Tyrion?[p/] Is everything okay?
translation: Celeste: 嗨，提利昂？[p/]你还好吗？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Celeste...[p/] I think...[p/] Beatrice was actually behind this.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……[p/]我想……[p/]比亚特丽丝真的是幕后黑手。

original: Celeste: What?!
translation: Celeste: 什么？！

original: You don't blame her for not believing you...[p/] It's not as if you can tell her about the Eye of Horus.
translation: 你不怪她不相信你……[p/]因为你不能告诉她荷鲁斯之眼的事。

original: Although...[p/] Why [i]haven't[/i] you told her?
translation: 不过……[p/]你为什么<u>不</u>告诉她？

original: Celeste: Alright.[p/] I believe you.
translation: Celeste: 好吧。[p/]我相信你。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Celeste: You wouldn't say something like that if you weren't sure, right?
translation: Celeste: 如果你没有把握的话就不会那样说了，对吧？

original: Celeste: But if what you're saying is true,[p/] what do we do now?
translation: Celeste: 但是如果你说的是真的，[p/]我们现在该怎么办？

original: You think long and hard for a moment.
translation: 你苦思冥想了一会儿。

original: Tyrion: ...I don't think we need to do anything.
translation: Tyrion: ……我认为我们不需要做任何事情。

original: Celeste: What?
translation: Celeste: 什么?

original: Tyrion: Steelwind is handling the prosecution.[p/] And she's definitely no pushover.
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德会负责起诉。[p/]而她绝对不是好惹的。

original: Tyrion: If Beatrice is truly guilty,[p/] I'll just have to trust her to get the job done.
translation: Tyrion: 如果比亚特丽丝真的有罪，[p/]我只有相信她能起诉成功。

original: Tyrion: Either way,[p/] I don't think we're in any position to get involved.
translation: Tyrion: 无论如何，[p/]我认为我们没必要参与其中。

original: Celeste: Alright...[p/] If you say so.
translation: Celeste: 好吧……[p/]既然你这么说了。

original: It's really none of your business.
translation: 这确实不关你的事。

original: You have no stake in this.[p/] You're not obligated to do anything.
translation: 这件事和你不存在利益牵扯。[p/]你没有义务做任何事。

original: You've done everything you can.[p/] It's in their hands now.
translation: 你已经尽自己所能。[p/]现在就看他们的了。

original: It's none of your business.
translation: 这与你无关。

original: This isn't your fight...
translation: 这不是你的官司……

original: William Frega was a tyrant and a bigot anyway.[p/] He's a noble who did nothing but steal wealth from the commonfolk.
translation: 总之威廉·弗雷加就是个暴君和偏执狂。[p/]是个只会从平民那里窃取财富的贵族。

original: The world is better off without him.[p/] And it's not as if you didn't try.
translation: 没了他世界会更好。[p/]你不是没有为此努力过。

original: All you have to do is wait for the trial to run its course.
translation: 你要做的就是等待庭审的结果。

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/][s/] I'm afraid you can't pass a verdict just yet!
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下！[p/][s/]恐怕你现在还不能做出判决！

original: Judge: M-[p/][s/]Mr. Cuthbert?!
translation: Judge: 卡、[p/][s/]卡斯伯特先生？！

original: Ruby: ...Cuthbert?
translation: Ruby: ……卡斯伯特？

original: Ruby: What the hell are you doing?!
translation: Ruby: 你到底在干什么？！

original: Tyrion: I...[p/] don't know.
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]不知道。

original: Tyrion: But what I [i]do[/i] know is that there was a massive contradiction in Miriam Frega's testimony.
translation: Tyrion: 但我<u>确实</u>知道的是米莉亚姆·弗雷加的证词存在一个巨大的矛盾。

original: ...Who were you kidding?
translation: ……你在骗谁呢？

original: As if you were [i]ever[/i] the type of person to stand by and do nothing.
translation: 好像你是那种袖手旁观的人似的。

original: Celeste: Agh!
translation: Celeste: 啊！

original: Tyrion: What's wrong?
translation: Tyrion: 怎么了？

original: Celeste: You can't see it.[p/] But the entire room is covered in traces of [b]abjuration[/b] magic.
translation: Celeste: 你看不到。[p/]但是整个房间里遍布着防护魔法的痕迹。

original: Celeste: [i]Everything[/i] is glowing white.
translation: Celeste: <u>一切</u>都闪着白光。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] That makes sense.[p/] There were several [i]Anti-Magic Fields[/i] covering the manor.
translation: Tyrion: 对……[p/]这就说得通了。[p/]庄园被几个<u>抗魔力场</u>覆盖着。

original: Tyrion: Those fields probably left traces of [b]abjuration[/b] everywhere.
translation: Tyrion: 那些地方可能到处都留下了防护魔法的痕迹。

original: Celeste: I won't bother showing you the traces of [b]abjuration[/b] I find while we're here.
translation: Celeste: 我就不费劲向你展示我在这里发现的防护魔法痕迹了。

original: Tyrion: It's a highly extravagant bed.[p/] It looks similar to the one in Miriam's dorm.
translation: Tyrion: 这是一张非常奢华的床。[p/]它看起来和米莉亚姆宿舍里的那张床很相似。

original: Tyrion: It's a dresser covered in a layer of dust.[p/] It doesn't look like it's been touched in years.
translation: Tyrion: 梳妆台上积了一层灰。[p/]它看起来好些年没被碰过了。

original: Liafal: ...
translation: Liafal: ……

original: Tyrion: It's a table for guests.[p/] But it's extremely dusty.
translation: Tyrion: 这是给客人用的桌子。[p/]但灰尘特别多。

original: Celeste: There's a trace of [b]transmutation[/b] magic under the bed.
translation: Celeste: 床底下有形变魔法的痕迹。

original: Celeste: I can't see it clearly...[p/] Let me take a closer look.
translation: Celeste: 我看不太清楚……[p/]让我仔细看看。

original: Celeste: It's Crimson Lotus!
translation: Celeste: 是绯莲！

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Celeste: It's my sword!
translation: Celeste: 是我的剑！

original: Liafal: What?!
translation: Liafal: 什么？！

original: You never knew her sword had a name...
translation: 你一直不知道她的剑有名字……

original: Celeste: So [i]this[/i] is where it's been!
translation: Celeste: 原来它一直在<u>这里</u>！

original: But why would it be [i]here[/i]...?
translation: 但是它为什么会在那里……？

original: Tyrion: This is also the room where they found the Sword of Spell Eating...
translation: Tyrion: 这里也是他们找到噬法之剑的房间……

original: Tyrion: Are the two thefts related somehow?
translation: Tyrion: 这两起盗窃有什么关联吗？

original: Celeste: But why?[p/] The only thing similar about them is that they're both swords.
translation: Celeste: 但是为什么呢？[p/]它们唯一的相似之处就是它们都是剑。

original: There's definitely more to this...[p/] but what?
translation: 肯定不仅如此……[p/]但是什么呢？

original: Liafal: I wasn't trying to be uncooperative,[p/] but I didn't know who I could trust.
translation: Liafal: 我不是不想合作，[p/]但是我不知道我可以信任谁。

original: Tyrion: Considering the circumstances,[p/] that's perfectly understandable.
translation: Tyrion: 考虑到目前的情况，[p/]完全可以理解。

original: Liafal: I'm not sure why,[p/] but my father was extremely upset that night.
translation: Liafal: 我不清楚为什么，[p/]但是那天晚上父亲非常生气。

original: Liafal: According to him,[p/] Beatrice had returned and was even more "impudent" than before.
translation: Liafal: 他说，[p/]比亚特丽丝回来了，而且比以前更加“厚颜无耻”。

original: Tyrion: He must have been angry about something she said during their meeting...
translation: Tyrion: 他肯定是对他们会面时她说的某件事感到生气……

original: Tyrion: Did he tell you what their meeting was about?
translation: Tyrion: 他有没有告诉你他们的会面是关于什么的？

original: Liafal: He didn't.[p/] And I honestly didn't really care.
translation: Liafal: 没有。[p/]而且说实话我并不怎么在意。

original: Liafal: I was just so happy that my sister had finally returned.
translation: Liafal: 我只是非常高兴我的姐姐终于回来了。

original: Liafal: But my father clearly felt the opposite.
translation: Liafal: 但是父亲的感觉显然与我不同。

original: Liafal: Before he entered his study,[p/] he told me that he would be "pruning the family tree".
translation: Liafal: 他在进入书房之前，[p/]告诉我他要 “修剪家谱”。

original: Liafal: He was going to disinherit my sister and several other members of our family.
translation: Liafal: 他打算剥夺我姐姐和其他几个家族成员的继承权。

original: Tyrion: He probably started drafting a new will to reflect that decision.
translation: Tyrion: 他可能已经开始起草新的遗嘱来表示他的决定。

original: Tyrion: Has anyone found the draft of this will?
translation: Tyrion: 有人找到这份遗嘱的草稿了吗？

original: Liafal: No.[p/] It was one of the first things I looked for after the investigation began.
translation: Liafal: 没有。[p/]它是我在调查开始后首先要找的东西之一。

original: The modified will is missing?[p/]
translation: 修改后的遗嘱不见了？[p/]

original: You doubt that it would even be enforced.[p/] He never got a chance to submit it for probate before he died.
translation: 你甚至怀疑它不会被执行。[p/]他在去世前并没有机会提交遗嘱认证。

original: But you can't discount the possibility that the murderer destroyed it...
translation: 但是你不能排除凶手销毁它的可能性……

original: Tyrion: Did anyone else know about this?
translation: Tyrion: 还有其他人知道这件事吗？

original: Liafal: No one.[p/] I didn't even tell Lady Steelwind when she was questioning me.
translation: Liafal: 没有了。[p/]甚至斯蒂尔文德女士问我的时候我也没告诉她。

original: Tyrion: ...Because it would've given Beatrice a motive to commit the murder?
translation: Tyrion: ……因为这会给比亚特丽丝提供杀人动机？

original: Liafal: ...
translation: Liafal: ……

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] thank you, Ms. Frega.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]谢谢你，弗雷加女士。

original: Liafal: ...Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Liafal: ……卡斯伯特先生。

original: Tyrion: Yes?
translation: Tyrion: 怎么了？

original: Liafal: My sister...[p/] is not a bad person.
translation: Liafal: 我姐姐……[p/]不是个坏人。

original: Liafal: There's no way that she'd do something like this.
translation: Liafal: 她不可能做出这样的事情。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Despite what she says,[p/] she seems to have some doubts.
translation: 话虽这么说，[p/]她似乎有些疑虑。

original: Tyrion: She's in good hands.[p/] Ruby Tymora is the one defending her in the trial, after all.
translation: Tyrion: 她被照顾得很好。[p/]毕竟是鲁比·泰摩拉在法庭上为她辩护。

original: Liafal: I hope so...
translation: Liafal: 希望如此……

original: Tyrion: I'm sorry for your loss, Lady Frega.[p/] But do you mind if I ask you some questions about last night?
translation: Tyrion: 请节哀顺变，弗雷加女士。[p/]不过，我可以问你一些关于昨晚的问题吗？

original: Liafal: ...Of course.
translation: Liafal: ……当然 。

original: Tyrion: Prosecutor Steelwind told us that you were the last person to see him alive.
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德检察官告诉我们你是最后一个见到活着的他的人。

original: Tyrion: Did you notice anything unusual about your father's behavior?
translation: Tyrion: 你有注意到你父亲的行为有什么异常之处吗？

original: Liafal: Well he [i]was[/i] extremely upset about something.[p/] I think Beatrice may have offended him during their meeting.
translation: Liafal: 嗯他当时因为什么事非常生气。[p/]我觉得比亚特丽丝在他们会面的时候可能冒犯了他。

original: Liafal: The servants said that he wanted to be left alone.[p/] He retreated into his study immediately after their meeting.
translation: Liafal: 仆人们说他想一个人待着。[p/]他在会面后马上就回到了自己的书房。

original: Liafal: I tried to speak with him when the theft was reported.[p/] But he didn't much care about the missing artifact.
translation: Liafal: 盗窃案上报时我试图找他谈谈。[p/]但他对丢失的文物不是很在意。

original: Liafal: He told me to leave him alone and let the Kingsguard investigate the Sword. [mind="He was probably busy making the changes to his will."/]
translation: Liafal: 他让我别管他，然后派了国王卫队去调查失踪的剑。[mind="他可能正在忙着修改遗嘱。"/]

original: Now [i]that's[/i] an interesting thought...
translation: 这真是个有趣的想法……

original: Tyrion: ...When did you speak with him last?
translation: Tyrion: ……你最后一次和他交谈是什么时候？

original: Liafal: It was before they activated the lockdown.[p/] It was a little after 1:00 AM that night.
translation: Liafal: 在他们启动封锁之前。[p/]晚上凌晨 1 点多。

original: Tyrion: ...And do you have any idea what he was doing in his study?
translation: Tyrion: ……你知道他在书房里做什么吗？

original: Liafal: ...What?
translation: Liafal: ……什么？

original: Liafal: N-[p/][s/]No...[p/] I have no idea.
translation: Liafal: 不、[p/][s/]不清楚……[p/]我不知道。

original: You detect some fear from her.
translation: 你察觉到她有一些恐惧。

original: Tyrion: Lady Frega,[p/] is there something you're not telling us?
translation: Tyrion: 弗雷加女士，[p/]你还有什么事情没告诉我们吗？

original: Tyrion: It's important that we know about your father's actions before his death.
translation: Tyrion: 了解你父亲生前的行为对我们来说很重要。

original: Liafal: ...I'm sorry.[p/] I don't know anything else.
translation: Liafal: ……抱歉。[p/]我没什么要说的了。

original: Liafal: My father was a private man and didn't share much with anyone,[p/] even his own family.
translation: Liafal: 我父亲是个很注重隐私的人，[p/]即便是他的家人，他也不会分享太多事情。

original: Liafal: I wish I could be of more help,[p/] but I really don't know anything else. [mind="I refuse to believe that's why he was killed."/]
translation: Liafal: 我希望能帮上忙，[p/]但我知道的确实就这么多。[mind="我绝不相信<u>那是</u>他被杀的原因。"/]

original: She's clearly holding something back.
translation: 她显然有所隐瞒。

original: If you can reveal what she's hiding through an ARGUMENT,[p/] she might be more willing to cooperate.
translation: 如果你能通过<size=1.5em>辩论</size>揭示她隐藏的东西，[p/]她可能会更愿意配合。

original: But you'll need more information about William and his will first.
translation: 但是首先你需要更多关于威廉以及他的遗嘱的信息。

original: In the meantime,[p/] you should figure out what else she knows.
translation: 与此同时，[p/]你应该弄清楚她还知道些什么。

original: Tyrion: I noticed that this room hasn't been cleaned recently.[p/] Do you know why?
translation: Tyrion: 我注意到这个房间最近没有打扫过。[p/]你知道为什么吗？

original: Liafal: It's because I've forbidden the servants from cleaning this room.
translation: Liafal: 因为我禁止仆人打扫这个房间。

original: Tyrion: ...And why would you do that?
translation: Tyrion: ……那你为什么这么做？

original: Liafal: Beatrice was-...[p/] [i]is[/i] very dear to me,[p/] and I couldn't bear to have her room disturbed after she left.
translation: Liafal: 比亚特丽丝曾经是、[p/]<u>现在也是</u>我亲爱的姐姐，[p/]我不允许在她离开后破坏她的房间。

original: Liafal: This room was the only memory I had of her after she left.
translation: Liafal: 这间屋子是她离开后我对她唯一的记忆。

original: You suppose that makes sense.[p/] She must have been holding onto the hope that her sister would return.
translation: 你觉得她的解释说得通。[p/]她一定一直抱着姐姐会回来的希望。

original: Tyrion: And what about the Sword of Spell Eating?[p/] Do you know how it ended up in this room?
translation: Tyrion: 关于噬法之剑呢？[p/]你知道它是怎么出现在这个房间里的吗？

original: Liafal: I-[p/][s/]I'm not sure.[p/] It's possible someone planted it here to frame Beatrice.
translation: Liafal: 我、[p/][s/]我不太确定。[p/]可能有人把它放在这里来陷害比亚特丽丝。

original: Liafal: I can't say why they would choose this room, though.
translation: Liafal: 虽然我不知道他们为什么会选择这个房间。

original: Tyrion: What kind of person was your father?
translation: Tyrion: 你父亲是个什么样的人？

original: Liafal: ...
translation: Liafal: ……

original: Hm...[p/] It doesn't look like William Frega was very beloved.
translation: 嗯……[p/]看起来威廉·弗雷加不太受人喜爱。

original: Liafal: My father was a...[p/] complicated man.
translation: Liafal: 我父亲是个……[p/]复杂的人。

original: Liafal: He was a brilliant scholar and businessman...[p/] But he was a cold and distant father.
translation: Liafal: 他是杰出的学者和商人……[p/]但他也是冷漠且疏远的父亲。

original: Tyrion: I see.[p/] Did he have any enemies?
translation: Tyrion: 我知道了。[p/]他有什么敌人吗？

original: Liafal: As the head of House Frega,[p/] he controlled nearly every banking house in Wyverngarde.
translation: Liafal: 作为弗雷加家族的首领，[p/]他几乎控制了维文加德所有的银行。

original: Liafal: There were many people who resented his wealth and power.
translation: Liafal: 有很多人愤恨他的财富和权力。

original: Tyrion: Can you remember anyone specific?[p/] Perhaps someone that he'd slighted recently?
translation: Tyrion: 你能想起具体的某个人吗？[p/]或许是他最近得罪过的人？

original: Liafal: There [i]was[/i] Lloyd von Sanctus.
translation: Liafal: 那<u>就是</u>洛伊德·冯·桑克图斯。

original: Tyrion: ...The ruling Lord of Aurinax?
translation: Tyrion: 欧奥耐克斯的领主？

original: Liafal: Yes.[p/] I heard that he was recently involved in a court case.
translation: Liafal: 对。[p/]我听说他最近卷入了一起官司。

original: Liafal: My father has been using the controversy as an opportunity to slowly take control of Von Sanctus Industries.
translation: Liafal: 我父亲正以这次风波为机会，逐步控制冯·桑克图斯工业产业。

original: Liafal: And from what I've heard,[p/] he's been extremely bitter about that.
translation: Liafal: 据我所知，[p/]他对此一直极为不满。

original: Von Sanctus's reputation must have taken a hit after the Dracogen trials.
translation: 冯·桑克图斯的声誉在德拉科根案件后肯定受到了打击。

original: You doubt he'd get himself involved in [i]another[/i] murder.
translation: 你怀疑他不会<u>再次</u>卷入一起谋杀案。

original: But you can never be too sure.[p/] You'll want to speak with him and get more details.
translation: 但你也不太肯定。[p/]你需要和他谈谈，了解更多细节。

original: ...Although,[p/] would he even consider cooperating with you?
translation: ……不过，[p/]他会考虑和你合作吗？

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] are there any other enemies he might have had?
translation: Tyrion: 先不提他，[p/]他还有其他的敌人吗？

original: Liafal: No.[p/] None that I can think of.
translation: Liafal: 没有。[p/]我想不到了。

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about Beatrice Frega?
translation: Tyrion: 关于比亚特丽丝·弗雷加，你能告诉我些什么？

original: Tyrion: I heard that she fled the Frega estate five years ago.
translation: Tyrion: 我听说她五年前离开了弗雷加庄园。

original: Liafal: ...
translation: Liafal: ……

original: Liafal: Before she left,[p/] Beatrice was one of the most powerful mages I'd ever seen.
translation: Liafal: 在她离开前，[p/]比亚特丽丝是我认识的最强大的法师。

original: Liafal: She was...[p/] She [i]is[/i] incredible.
translation: Liafal: 她……[p/]她非常了不起。

original: Liafal: At the age of thirteen,[p/] her talent for magic had even eclipsed my father's.
translation: Liafal: 她十三岁的时候，[p/]在魔法方面的天赋甚至已经超过了我父亲。

original: Liafal: ...But it was never enough for him.
translation: Liafal: ……但他还是不满足。

original: Tyrion: What do you mean?
translation: Tyrion: 什么意思？

original: Liafal: Before my mother died,[p/] he desperately wanted a son,[p/] but he only ever had daughters.
translation: Liafal: 我母亲去世前，[p/]他迫切地想要一个儿子，[p/]但他只有女儿。

original: Liafal: Everyone thought that Beatrice would inherit House Frega from my father,[p/] but our family knew the truth.
translation: Liafal: 人们都以为比亚特丽丝会从我父亲那里继承弗雷加家族，[p/]但我们全家都知道事实并非如此。

original: Liafal: William Frega would never leave his legacy in the hands of a woman.
translation: Liafal: 威廉·弗雷加永远不会把他的遗产交到一个女人手里。

original: Celeste: What...?
translation: Celeste: 什么……？

original: Liafal: No matter how hard Beatrice tried,[p/] my father would never acknowledge her accomplishments.
translation: Liafal: 无论比亚特丽丝多么努力，[p/]我父亲都不会认可她的成就。

original: Liafal: He was extremely cruel to her.[p/] He constantly belittled her achievements and dismissed anything she said to him.
